overview.title: Hey John!
overview.description: We've prepared this custom presentation specifically for the Hasura team to show how PostHog can accelerate your product development.

custom_integration.name: Hasura + PostHog Integration
custom_integration.title: Seamless GraphQL Analytics
custom_integration.description: Track GraphQL query performance, monitor API usage, and understand how developers interact with your platform. PostHog integrates directly with Hasura to give you instant insights.

cta.title: Let's discuss Hasura's needs
cta.description: We'd love to show you how PostHog can help Hasura build an even better developer experience.
